ComicInfo.Summary:
Luke Skywalker and Wedge Antilles have infiltrated an Imperial Destroyer. But now nine thousand stormtroopers are searching for them, and Darth Vader is aware of their presence. Completing their mission and escaping with their lives may be an either/or proposition!
Meanwhile, the Rebel fleet prepares for an Imperial assault!
Artist Carlos D’Anda returns!
Legendary Star Wars cover artist Hugh Fleming!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-04 21:16:45. [CVDB428282]
ComicInfo.Characters: 2-1B, Birra Seah, Boba Fett, C-3PO, Chewbacca, Darth Vader, Han Solo, Kell Bircher , Luke Skywalker, Mon Mothma, Perla, Princess Leia, Prithi, Wedge Antilles
ComicInfo.Teams: Galactic Empire, Mon Calamari, Rebel Alliance, Stormtroopers, The Sith, Wookiees
